text: aur hamane aapase pahale maanav[1] purushon hee ko nabee banaakar bheja, jinakee or prakaashana bhejate rahe, nagar vaasiyon mein se, kya ve dharatee mein chale phire nahin, taaki dekhate ki unaka parinaam kya hua, jo inase pahale the? aur nishchay aakhirat (paralok) ka ghar (svarg) unake lie uttam hai, jo allaah se dare, to kya tum samajhate nahin ho
